snippet.title: Cozy Grove | OUT NOW!
snippet.description:
Cozy Grove is coming April 8th to Switch, Xbox, and PlayStation!

Cozy Grove is a slice-of-life game about camping on a haunted island! You are a Spirit Scout, exploring the island daily to find new hidden secrets and to help its spectral inhabitants come to terms with their past lives.
So pitch your tent and get to work! You'll cook, craft, decorate, fish, and camp alongside some bear-y ghostly beings in your quest to bring joy to this cozy island community.
Cozy Grove is the newest game from Spry Fox, known for making Triple Town, Road Not Taken, and Alphabear!

Cozy Grove on Switch: https://www.qag.io/CozyGroveSwitch
Cozy Grove on Xbox: https://www.qag.io/CozyGroveXbox
Cozy Grove on PlayStation: https://www.qag.io/CozyGrovePlayStation

Cozy Grove Website: https://spryfox.com/our-games/cozy-grove/
Cozy Grove on Twitter: https://twitter.com/cozygrove
Spry Fox Website: https://spryfox.com/

Quantum Website: https://www.qag.io
Quantum Twitter: https://twitter.com/QuantumApG
Quantum Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/QuantumApG
